mapper.select: SELECT S.SCHEDULE_NO ,S.CATEGORY ,S.SKD_TITLE ,S.SKD_CONTENT ,TO_CHAR(S.REG_DTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DTIME ,TO_CHAR(S.MOD_DTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MOD_DTIME ,TO_CHAR(S.SKD_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SKD_START ,TO_CHAR(S.SKD_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SKD_END ,S.SKD_TYPE_CD ,E.EMP_NO AS WRITER ,S.STAR FROM SCHEDULE S JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON S.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO WHERE S.SKD_TYPE_CD = '02' AND E.DEPT_CODE = #{DEPT_CODE} ORDER BY S.SKD_START ASC
